title: Episode 55 - "Telethon"
guest_stars: Bob Abdou, Pete Michael, Russ Powell
synopsis: SGC2C IS BROKE! Space Ghost, along with his usual cadre of regular villains (Moltar & Zorak) must have their own fund-raising event. The Council of Doom, Brak, and even Birdman all try to "help" in their own bumbling, evil, and conniving ways.(Synopsis by Harvey Best)

transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Greetings, citizens! I'm Space Ghost, with an important announcment to make. (clears his throat; talks quietly) We're broke. (violin music begins) That's right, the Space Ghost Coast to Coast show is out of cash. So tonight our regular show has been preimmunized for a special Space Ghost telethon. If you love me, or have ever loved me, or ever plan to love me in the future, I urge you tonight, to please stay tuned, pledge generously, to help keep the Ghost alive!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: So, whattya gonna do if the show gets canned?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I got a few irons in the fire.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Like what?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: They're remaking "MacGyver", only this time... he's a woman!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What're you talking about? He was always a woman!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh. Uh, I'm gonna get some coffee.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You don't have any leads, do ya?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Leave me alone!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You liar! You made that up!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Leave me alone!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You see, folks, hi-tech computer animation like this costs money. How much? I don't know, but trust me, it's one heck of a lot. And we're wiped out cleaner than a fat man's eatin' hand. (smile sparkles) So I turn to you, the viewers, in my quarter-hour of need. I know you folks will call the numbers flashing on the screen below, and pledge your undying support.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Because you have a jug o' love for me, and you're thirsty for what I got! (makes kisses to camera)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (wide-eyed) This is shameful, even to me!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's just so.. wrong.

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Ahem. A-hem!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Why, look, everybody! The Council of Doom is here! They'll be standing by to take your flood of calls.

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Yes! And every twenty dollar pledge r-r-receives a kissy-kiss, from your truly!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Really?

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Yes, come over here, Tanny! Come a little closer, I want to smell what you've been eating all day!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (whimpers)

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Liverwurst! Divine! (sniff sniff) Oh, and thick sliced cross cut of bologna! How fragrant!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I'd pay twenty bucks to hear Lokar shut up!

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: And you need to get over yourself, lover!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (pause) Our goal tonight is a mere seventeen and a half million dollars!

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Tell me, Space Ghost, you oafish lunkheaded clodpate, you tr-r-ruly believe that you can r-r-raise that much wampum in such a paltry amount of time?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes indeedy! I'm putting my money where my mouth is!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm going to start us off by donating the proceeds from the sale of three pints of my (echo effect) Super Space Blood! (end echo) Moltar, let's go to the big board.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (throws lever) (numbers spin on the "DON'T GIVE UP the GHOST" tote board, with the final total showing:)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (subdued) Woo whee.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (taps his cards) And I'm sure we'll be adding it up with our first performer. So make that pledge now, folks, while we bring on funny man Pete Michael! (band music intro)

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: Oooooh! Aaaaah!

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: Thank you! Ghost Planet, how are ya, Space Ghost, very good to see you. It's great to be here, ladies and gentlemen, you too, Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Don't you even look at me!

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: But, uh, Ghost Planet, boy, this is somethin'. I can't believe I got a flight up here! (rim shot)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: But, it's great to be anywhere, I tell ya, the club I was workin' at last week? Big Jehovah Witness convention at the hotel I was stayin' at.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: And you know what I did? I went out after my show... What did I... Ah... sorry. (walks off stage)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, now, wasn't that... Pete Michael, every one.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! Somebody just called, and they wanna donate a billion dollars!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What's their name?!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Seymore Hiney.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Thank you so much, Seymore. Well, I guess we can wrap things up here.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: You idiot!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It was a prank call!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh... Oh. I am now rescinding my thank-you. Council, accept no more calls from the Hiney family. Moltar, next performer! Toot sweety!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Greetings, citizen Next Performer.

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: Greetings.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Arrr, 'tis a scurvy pirate!

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: A-a-ah! O-o-o-o-o!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: He's not a pirate, stupid!

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: Actually, I'm dressed out of the Renaissance period...

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: A humanistic revival of art, literature, and learning in Europe which occurred during the 14th through 16th centuries. Tell me something I don't know!

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: Can I show you some juggling while I'm here?

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Juggling! Oh boy! Do it! Do some juggling!

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: (juggles three colored balls, accompanied by cheesy organ music)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, he's honestly juggling! Come on, folks, isn't this worth at least a few million?

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: Ooh, watch him juggle!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey, wait a second, the total just went down five dollars!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I know, I.. just rented "Barb Wire". I hear it's awesome. (Moltar's monitor says:)

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I wanna see that!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's rated "R", Brak!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Aw, poop.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Oh!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Greetings, citizens! (Moltar's monitor says:)

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: O-o-o-o-o!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Obscene bird call!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Are you getting enough oxygen?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Look, Birdman, I'm in the middle of my telethon right now.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: You know, Tad, don't you think it's ironic that when I ask for money it's called begging, but when you drop to your knees it's called a telethon.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, how about that? Ain't that somethin'?

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: I got somethin' I can do for your telethon. How about I decorate your back window with a little of my special guano?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How about if I throw some corn on the floor and you peck it up with your mouth!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: That's okay, Birdman, I'll do it, I like corn!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: (shakes his head) I'm outta here. (image fades from monitor)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Um, uh, let's keep things moving. Uh, Moltar, how about another guest?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (Moltar's monitor says:)

transcript.speaker: Coco
transcript.dialogue: Moltar!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen, let's hear it for...

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: O-o-o-o-o!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Uh, Bob and Robby!

transcript.speaker: Ventriloquist Dummy
transcript.dialogue: Hey, how ya doin'?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Um, your little friend just, um, talked.

transcript.speaker: Ventriloquist Dummy
transcript.dialogue: (to Bob) Little friend, who's he talkin' to?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's a puppet!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: A puppet! Did you say a puppet?

transcript.speaker: Bob Abdou
transcript.dialogue: Yes, puppet.

transcript.speaker: Ventriloquist Dummy
transcript.dialogue: Puppet. P-p-p-p-p-p-p.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aaaa! The puppet talks! Zorak! The puppet talks!

transcript.speaker: Ventriloquist Dummy
transcript.dialogue: P-p-p-p-p-p-p. P-p-p-p-p-p-p. P-p-p-p-p-p-p.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts Bob and Robby from the monitor; Russ reappears, holding three knives)

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: O-o-o-o-o!

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: One, two, three, here we go. (starts juggling the knives)

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: (screams)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bless you, Santa, it's the Juggler!

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: (continues screaming)

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Oh, Black Widow, please continue that shrieking, because it can't possibly be more annoying!

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: (still juggling knives) Now, I have a confession to make here, I have never really figured out a way to stop this. So, uh, any ideas?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Uh, let it fall on your head.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, do that.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Mmm, that might be dangerous. (Moltar's monitor says:)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, throw 'em up really high, and catch 'em in your mouth.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: But be careful.

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: (still juggling knives) There we go.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts Russ on monitor)

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: Oh! (drops the knives) I missed that.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Council of Doom! Any calls?

transcript.speaker: Council of Doom
transcript.dialogue: No!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, then, I guess we can take a break for some commercial messages.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Telethons don't have commericals!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And bugs don't talk, Zorak, (switches to Zorak voice) so welcome to the asylum!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares back wide-eyed)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And we're back. Moltar, how are the phones?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (whispering) Silent, like crabs.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yes, like crabs.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (This is worse than the time you had to battle the Bedouin battleships bare-bottom to the thumbtack factory.)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (What can I do to save this turkey?) Council of Doom? (aims power bands) Give me your money!

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: No! I shan't give you a sheckel.

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: O-o-o-oh no!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Okay, here's my allowance.

transcript.speaker: Metallus
transcript.dialogue: (drones and slams fist)

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: You still owe me money!

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: (mocking) You still owe me money! You still owe me money! Ah, there it is again, the acrid putrocity of Tansut's chronic halitosis!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (whimpers)

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Shut that stench-hole or I shall gag!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (None of this is real.)

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: (back on stage) Ghost Planet, how are ya? Space Ghost, very good to see you. (band music plays)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Pete Michael, everybody.

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: Ladies and gentlemen, it's great to be here, good to see ya. You too, Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Feh.

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: But, man, Ghost Planet, finally, finally get to be on Ghost Planet.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Phones are open, folks.

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: I can't believe I got a flight up here. (rim show, by Christy)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: But, uh, gol, I keep forgetting about that Jehovah Witness thing.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nice try, freak.

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: I'm sorry, I was off my mark anyway. (walks off stage, in front of Space Ghost's desk)

transcript.speaker: Ventriloquist Dummy
transcript.dialogue: (sings) Goodnight, oh-h-h-h!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Phones are open, folks.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (looking at weather map on control room monitor) You see, these drops are falling in between these lines here, and you might want to keep an eye out for this big "H", 'cause that's where heaven is.

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: Well, we can do "Viva Las Vegas", but we, uh, I have it on cassette.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm sorry, but I'm gonna have to blast you, because we're not getting any calls, and you're the nearest scapegoat.

transcript.speaker: Russ Powell
transcript.dialogue: Oh, okay.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (blasts them off the monitor) (subdued) Well, what else can I say, except... (looks at his blue card) Ladies and gentlemen... (band music plays)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, no!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Pete Michael.

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: (walking onto stage) Thank you.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, you're welcome!

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: Thank you, Ghost Planet, it's great to see everyone. Even you, Zorak.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Shine on, you crazy diamond. (rim shot)

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: (looks around)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Phones are open, folks.

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: Guys, we cannot pick up women in fast food restaurants. There is only one person who can pick up a girl at the salad bar at Burger King. That person, of course, is... (turns around, puts on wig)

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Pete Michael! Pete Michael? You, Pete Michael! Pete Michael!

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: (turns around, wearing Kramer wig) Kramer, from "Seinfeld".

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Kramer!?

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Oh boy, an impression!

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: You see, he's gonna act like Kramer from "Seinfeld", but he's really not.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Aw, what a gyp.

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: (doing Kramer gestures and voice) Cucumbers. Roughage. Cool! So, can I buy you a pie? Aaaaa!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (In my head, where it's safe a warm, I'm making lots of money.)

transcript.speaker: Pete Michael
transcript.dialogue: ... Oh, yes. (phone rings in background) (normal voice) I've never done anything where absolutely nobody laughs.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Welcome to Space Ghost Coast to Coast.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh, they're laughin' alright.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! There's a call!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Is it one of those Hineys?

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Um... yes.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Argh! That's it! (pounds desk) I've had it with you people! I do this Hindenburg of a talk show each week, and where does it get me? Humiliation City, population one. Listen up, TV land: if you don't give me all your money, I'm.. gonna.. uh, shoot Brak!

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: I didn't do anything bad! (sobbing) I don't wanna be shot!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What am I doing? Brak, I, I am sorry.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: It's okay, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It is? Well then... (blasts Brak)

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Aaaaa! (blam!) Yeow, that smarts.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: There! See? See what you people made me do? (dramatic drum roll, Big Board counts down)

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: Ten! Nine! Eight! Seven! Six! Five! Four! Three! Two! One!

transcript.speaker: Black Widow
transcript.dialogue: O-o-o-o-o!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Happy new year!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whoa, mama! Come on, come on, come on, c'mon c'mon c'mon c'mon c'mon! Yes! (digits start to reveal themselves, total is larger than $31.10) Yes! (pounds his desk)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Wh- wha, whu, but th-th-th-that's impossible, Moltar, because we...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, the big board cost fifteen thou, and there's the added phone lines, teamsters, catering from Taco King. (Moltar's monitor says: SAYS WHO?, credits roll) The blue screen for the comedian, that cost ten grand, plus he took a cab. The weather graphics, "Barb Wire" rental, the Council's fees, and, oh yeah, the eighty thousand dollar Ming dynasty vase that Brak is about to knock over.

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Dig this, Ming, I'm sick of your dynasty! (sound of vase breaking)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Moltar, what's going on?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Um, they cut the power.

transcript.speaker: Tansut
transcript.dialogue: (whispers) Hey! Let's all take off our masks! (laughs)
